name: Depressed Lizard
description:
Depressed Lizard is a game where a scientist goes rouge and steals one of the test subject lizards. He does terrible things to it making the lizard sadder until the state of depression. When the company finds out they take the lizard and try to fix what had been done. Nothing worked so they gave the lizard to you. Help take care of your friend to reinstall happiness in his life.

Join our discord and ask for the password to the file.  https://discord.gg/Ara4KrS

ps. you have to use 7-Zip
